metadata.title: Synthesis and antiviral activity evaluation of acyclic 2 0 -azanucleosides bearing a phosphonomethoxy function in the side chain

abstract.original_text: Acyclic 2 0 -azanucleosides with a phosphonomethoxy function in the side chain were obtained by coupling of diethyl {2-[N-(pivaloyloxymethyl)-N-(p-toluenesulfonyl)amino]ethoxymethyl}phosphonate with the pyrimidine nucleobases via the Vorbrüggen-type protocol. The compounds were evaluated in vitro for activity against a broad variety of RNA and DNA viruses.

sentences.segment_text: Acyclic 2 0 - azanucleosides with a phosphonomethoxy function in the side chain were obtained by coupling of diethyl ( 2 - ( N - ( pivaloyloxymethyl ) - N - ( p-toluenesulfonyl ) amino ) ethoxymethyl ) phosphonate with the pyrimidine nucleobases via the Vorbrüggen-type protocol .
The compounds were evaluated in vitro for activity against a broad variety of RNA and DNA viruses .
